p: Chemical constituent of the EOs under investigations was characterized by Automated Mass spectral Deconvolution and Identification (AMDIS) software ( www.amdis.net, accessed on 2 January 2020), retention indexes (relative to n-alkanes C 8-C 22), comparison of the mass spectrum with authentics (if available), and Wiley spectral library collection and NSIT library database (Gaithersburg, MD, USA; Wiley, Hoboken, NJ, USA).
